items.sentence: I put a red mark on the calendar for my birthday.

I went to sleep with a handkerchief over my face.

I don't want to have you involved in the trouble.
I cooperated with my sister in cleaning the room.
I have a friend whose father is an animal doctor.
I had enough to do looking after my own children.
I could solve the problem without any difficulty.
I always felt ill at ease in my father's company.
I usually buy my clothes at the department store.
I make it a rule to get up at six in the morning.
I like to take a hot bath every night before bed.

I make a point of being in time for appointments.
I was caught in a shower and got wet to the skin.

I lived in Boston until I was thirteen years old.

I thought you said that this was going to be fun.

I have a pretty good idea what\'s going to happen.
